visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a pie chart with a hollow semi-circle. The chart should display browser shares for January 2022. The title should be centered and styled with a specific font size. The pie chart should have data labels enabled, positioned inside the pie, and styled with bold white text. The chart should also include a tooltip that displays the percentage of each browser share. The pie chart should be configured to start and end at specific angles, with a custom center and size. The series data should include the name of each browser and its corresponding share percentage.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a pie chart with a hollow semi-circle, which is a compact visualization often used in dashboards. The chart displays browser shares for January 2022, with the title centered and styled with a specific font size. The pie chart includes data labels that are positioned inside the pie, styled with bold white text, and enabled to show the percentage of each browser share. The tooltip is configured to display the percentage of each browser share when hovered over. The pie chart is set to start and end at specific angles, with a custom center and size, creating the effect of a hollow semi-circle. The series data includes the name of each browser and its corresponding share percentage, formatted appropriately for Highcharts.
